channel.title: CVE Feed for Martin Gibson -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-47237|2023-11-09T18:09:49.955Z -- martin%20gibson -- auto%20publish%20for%20google%20my%20business
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Martin Gibson Auto Publish for Google My Business plugin <= 3.7 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-47181|2023-11-08T18:16:01.330Z -- martin%20gibson -- ideapush
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Martin Gibson IdeaPush plugin <= 8.52 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-45832|2023-10-24T12:12:07.040Z -- martin%20gibson -- wp%20gotowebinar
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Martin Gibson WP GoToWebinar plugin <= 14.45 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-32804|2024-06-10T14:12:37.699Z -- martin%20gibson -- wp%20gotowebinar
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Martin Gibson WP GoToWebinar.This issue affects WP GoToWebinar: from n/a through 14.46.

item.title: CVE-2024-32797|2024-06-10T14:54:08.959Z -- martin%20gibson -- wp%20linkedin%20auto%20publish
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Martin Gibson WP LinkedIn Auto Publish.This issue affects WP LinkedIn Auto Publish: from n/a through 8.11.
